contentList.content: Involved Patron
Your Patron makes a Demand on every <LSTag Tooltip="ShortRest">short</LSTag> or <LSTag Tooltip="LongRest">long Rest</LSTag>. If you fulfill it, you will be rewarded.
Patron's Infused Weapon
Your Weapon is infused with your Patrons Power. It has a +[1] bonus to <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> and deals an additional [2].
Patron's Demand
fourth level Spell Slots, or spell slots are full.
fifth level Spell Slots, or spell slots are full.
Deal at least [1] to an enemy to gain the favor of your Patron.
Use a Evocation Spell or Cantrip to gain the favor of your Patron.
Kill [1] Enemies with one Spell to gain the favor of your Patron.
Your Patron demands proof of your obedience, show it by <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_InvolvedFiendShowObedience">sacrificing a part of your Life Force</LSTag>.
Fiend's Advantage
Roll all your Damage with <LSTag Tooltip="Advantage">Advantage</LSTag>.
Kill [1] Enemies with your <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_Hexblade_Bind>Hexed Weapon</LSTag> to gain the favor of your Patron.
Kill an Enemy afflicted by the <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="HEXBLADES_CURSE">Hexblade's Curse</LSTag> to gain the Favor of your Patron.
Dissatisfied Patron
You have often ignored your patron's duties. Continue to defy your patron and you will be punished. The power your patron gives you is not uncondtional.

Hexblade's Thirst
You gain an <LSTag Type="Passive" Tooltip="ExtraAttack">extra attack</LSTag> with your <LSTag Type="Spell" Tooltip="Shout_Hexblade_Bind>Hexed Weapon</LSTag>.
Show Obedience
Show your Obedience to your Patron and reduce your maximum HP by [1]% until the next <LSTag Tooltip="LongRest">long Rest</LSTag>.
Obedient
You have shown your Patron your Obedience by sacrificing [1]% of your maximum HP until the next <LSTag Tooltip="LongRest">long Rest</LSTag>.
Additional Warlock Spell Slot
Your Patron has rewarded you with an additional <LSTag Tooltip="WarlockSpellSlot">Warlock Spell Slot</LSTag> until the next <LSTag Tooltip="ShortRest">short Rest</LSTag>.

Your Weapon is infused with your Patrons Power. It has a +[1] bonus to <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag>, deals an additional [2] and inflicts the Target with <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="BURNING">Burning</LSTag>.

Your Weapon is infused with your Patrons Power. It has a +[1] bonus to <LSTag Tooltip="AttackRoll">Attack Rolls</LSTag> and has a [2]% Chance to inflict the Target with <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="CHARMED">Charmed</LSTag> or <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="FRIGHTENED">Frightened</LSTag>.

Deal Damage to an enemy afflicted with <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="CHARMED">Charmed</LSTag>, <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="FRIGHTENED">Frightened</LSTag> or <LSTag Type="Status" Tooltip="SLEEPING">Sleeping</LSTag> to gain the favor of your Patron.
Use a Enchantment or Illusion Spell or Cantrip to gain the favor of your Patron.
